title: A superconvergent stencil-adaptive SBP-SAT finite difference scheme
abstract: A stencil-adaptive SBP-SAT finite difference scheme is shown to display superconvergent behavior. Applied to the linear advection equation, it has a convergence rate $\mathcal{O}(Δx^4)$ in contrast to a conventional scheme, which converges at a rate $\mathcal{O}(Δx^3)$.
